A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Have to agree with others: There's something ROTTEN about Rotten Tomatoes' score for this film!  
I can't prove critics were bribed but the *audience* score is CLEARLY lower than 50%

1/2 star and 1 star reviews outnumber positive ones so overwhelmingly\, it should be around 20% 
 
Also\, isn't it a bit suspicious that the majority of 5 star reviews are so brief and generic??
HuffPost put about the "anonymously sourced" rumour that the 1 star reviews were bots. (Even though\, most include clear\, specific reasons for disliking the film.)  That rumour was quickly debunked. But now\, it appears to have been a cover for fake 5 star reviews!
